description: In George Orwell’s Nineteen Eighty-Four, the ultimate act of rebellion comes when Winston Smith insists that two plus two equals four, defying a system that demands he accept whatever reality the Party declares. title: To Stop The Coup, We Must Be Clear About The Truth: Two Plus Two Equals Four
